description:
This course aims to empower new and experienced teachers alike with practical, easy-to-use technology and the best methods to integrate these tech tools into their classroom and daily lives.

During this course I’ll show how to use specific tools and resources that will help keep you organized, save you time, earn some extra money, and help you become a more fun and effective teacher.

I’m going to show you how you can manage your classes online and make them more memorable and fun. I’m also going to show you how to easily stay up to date and organized with the latest industry news, opportunities and teaching resources.
title: 12 Essential Tech Tools For Teachers And How To Use Them!
